questions.text: As shown in the figure below, there exists a process of converting each character of a character string in accordance with the conversion table. When the result of performing such a conversion is “0110001010”, which of the following is the character string before conversion?

options.a: ABBAAABB
options.b: ACAAABB
options.c: ACABB
options.d: CAAABB

questions.text: As shown in Figure 1, there is a processing unit which reads two positive input values A1 and A2, and then writes two output values B1 and B2. B1 is equal to A2, and B2 is the remainder of A1 divided by A2. In Figure 2, two processing units with the same function as the above are connected in series. When A1=15 and A2=6 are given to the left-hand unit in Figure 2, what is the output value of B2 for the right-hand unit?
Which of the following can be created using HTML?

options.a: Web browser
options.b: Web page
options.c: Cookie
options.d: SQL program

questions.text: Which of the following is the method for describing the logical structure of a sentence in XML?

options.a: Enclosing the sentence, clauses, and other elements by using double quotes (“”)
options.b: Separating the sentence, clauses, and other elements by using commas
options.c: Enclosing the sentence, clauses, and other elements by using tags
options.d: Separating the sentence, clauses, and other elements by using tabs

questions.text: Which of the following is a method of writing the same data to multiple hard disks simultaneously and improving reliability rather than performance?

options.a: Striping
options.b: Paging
options.c: Interleaving
options.d: Mirroring

questions.text: Which of the following is a storage device or medium that is based on semiconductor memory technology?

options.a: CD-ROM
options.b: DVD-RAM
options.c: BD
options.d: SSD

questions.text: Which of the following is a type of software that is provided for each PC peripheral and works as an intermediary between an OS and a specific peripheral so that application programs can use such a peripheral?

options.a: Installer
options.b: Device driver
options.c: Device manager
options.d: Converter

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning PnP used on a PC?

options.a: A feature to launch application programs from a remote site
options.b: A feature to set up peripherals automatically when connected
options.c: A feature to start up an OS automatically when powered on
options.d: A feature to run software developed for another OS

questions.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate description concerning a characteristic of RAID?

options.a: It increases the data transfer rate of each hard disk.
options.b: It provides a larger capacity than the total capacity of individual hard disks.
options.c: It provides better performance or reliability or both by using multiple hard disks.
options.d: It increases data access time because it needs to access multiple hard disks.

questions.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate explanation of TCO (Total Cost of Ownership) that is a major factor when any purchasing decision is made for a system?

options.a: It is the sum of the operation and management costs incurred after the installation of the system.
options.b: It is the sum of the costs required to troubleshoot software and hardware faults that occur after the installation of the system.
options.c: It is the sum of the costs incurred during the installation of the system and the operation and management costs incurred after the installation.
options.d: It is the sum of the costs incurred during the installation of the system in addition to the planning phase of the system.

questions.text: When a computer system operates for 1,200 hours, the status of the normal operation time and the repair time is shown in the table below. What is the value of MTTR (Mean Time To Repair, in hours) of the system? Elapsed time (Hours) Status 0 through 250 Normal operation 250 through 265 Repair time 265 through 580 Normal operation 580 through 600 Repair time 600 through 990 Normal operation 990 through 1,000 Repair time 1,000 through 1,200 Normal operation

Which of the following is the most appropriate term that means the process of grouping multiple files into one, for the purpose of making effective use of storage media or promoting the efficiency of backup or distribution?

options.a: Archive
options.b: Aggregate
options.c: Bundle
options.d: Compile

questions.text: Which of the following is the purpose of the virtual memory system that is known as one of the functions provided by an OS?

options.a: To prevent an application program from accessing the protected area on main memory used by the OS
options.b: To reduce electricity consumption during the idle state, by stopping the power supply after data is written from main memory to external storage
options.c: To make it possible to execute a program even if the program requires more storage capacity than main memory
options.d: To accelerate CPU processing with the assistance of a higher speed storage device than main memory

questions.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate explanation of a “multimedia authoring tool”?

options.a: It is a tool that is used to create multimedia content by combining materials, such as image, sound, and text, on the screen.
options.b: It is a tool that is used to play back multimedia content, such as image, sound, and text, in the PC environment.
options.c: It is a tool that is used to search for multimedia information, such as image, sound, and text.
options.d: It is a tool that is used to interactively define schema for multimedia database containing information, such as image, sound, and text.

questions.text: Which of the following is a unit that is used to represent “resolution”, one of the performance indicators of a display or a printer?

options.a: bps
options.b: dpi
options.c: fps
options.d: psi

questions.text: Which of the following is the concept representing a database that is built by extracting and restructuring data from a mission-critical business system for the purpose of supporting information analysis and decision making?

options.a: Data center
options.b: Data warehouse
options.c: Data mining
options.d: Data roaming

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate purpose of normalizing data in a relational database?

options.a: To guarantee data compatibility so that data can be shared between different types of computers
options.b: To prevent the occurrence of redundancy or inconsistency of data when data is updated
options.c: To identify characters that are not permitted to be sent when a database is used via a network
options.d: To handle data storage areas distributed over multiple media as a single contiguous storage area

questions.text: When the order records shown below are entered in the system where each order number must be uniquely defined, which of the following is the appropriate method for searching the order master file containing all of the past order records, and for checking the uniqueness of the order number? Order record Order number Order date Item code Quantity Customer code (Character) (year/month/day) (Character) (Numeric value) (Character)

options.a: Duplication check
options.b: Format check
options.c: Limit check
options.d: Logical check

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of DNS?

options.a: It is a system that is used to search for a wide variety of information through the Internet.
options.b: It is a system that is used to map between host names and IP addresses of devices connected to the Internet.
options.c: It is a personal authentication system that is used to provide a safe and secure online shopping environment.
options.d: It is a system that is used to manage personal e-mail addresses for the delivery of e-mail messages.

questions.text: When the Internet is accessed from an intranet, which of the following is the most appropriate mechanism that can be used to relay access to the Internet, to speed up access to it by caching Web content, and also to ensure security?

options.a: DMZ
options.b: Firewall
options.c: Proxy
options.d: Router

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of MIME used on the Internet?

options.a: It is a language that is used to describe hypertext on the Internet.
options.b: It is a hypertext transmission protocol between client and server on the Internet.
options.c: It is a method of address notation for uniquely identifying a resource on the Internet.
options.d: It is a standard of exchanging multimedia data, such as audio or video, by e-mail.

questions.text: When ten e-mail messages are sent successively from Company A to Company B, they may arrive at Company B in a different order from the order they are sent. Which of the following is the most possible reason for this phenomenon?

options.a: There is a problem with the setup of Company A’s mail server.
options.b: There is a problem with the setup of Company B’s firewall for e-mail.
options.c: There is a possibility that e-mail delivered late is falsified on the way.
options.d: There is a possibility that each e-mail is sent via different transfer routes.

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning cryptography?

options.a: The process of transforming the encrypted text back into its original plain text is called reset.
options.b: In common key cryptography, the encrypted text is transmitted together with the common key.
options.c: Public key cryptography uses two types of keys: a key for encryption and a key for recovering the plain text
options.d: Common key cryptography that is also known as secret key cryptography is used for digital signature.

questions.text: Which of the following is a characteristic of a Trojan horse that is a type of malicious program?

options.a: It is designed to infect a specific type of data file by using the macro function of application software.
options.b: It sends out fake virus information, such as a warning message about a new type of virus, through chain e-mails.
options.c: It performs self-propagation by sending copies of itself to other computers connected through a network.
options.d: It masquerades as a legitimate file or helpful program with the purpose of performing harmful operations.

questions.text: Which of the following can be made possible by using a digital signature in e-commerce?

options.a: Preventing an unintended third party from accessing any confidential file
options.b: Checking that a file is not infected with a virus or other malicious software
options.c: Protecting the content of a transaction from being leaked through wiretapping
options.d: Confirming the identity of a partner and the correctness of the details of a transaction

questions.text: When a PC is connected to an online shopping site on the Internet, the Web browser displays the SSL padlock icon on the screen. Also, it is confirmed that the server certificate is that of the operator of the intended online shopping site. Among the items A through C described below on such an occasion, which of the following is the appropriate combination of decisions to be made? Here, “√” means what can be decided, and “ −” means what cannot be decided? A: The operator of the shopping site being accessed is in stable financial condition. B: The online shopping site being accessed is not a fake or fraudulent site. C: The data and information entered by the user is never stolen along the way. A B C

A test in system development often adopts a build-up approach where tests are performed incrementally from a smaller to a larger unit. On such an occasion, which of the following is the appropriate test sequence?

options.a: System test → integration test → unit test
options.b: System test → unit test → integration test
options.c: Unit test → integration test → system test
options.d: Unit test → system test → integration test

questions.text: Which of the following is the term that means the process of modifying some of the functions of a software package on the basis of user environments and requirements?

options.a: Reengineering
options.b: Customization
options.c: Refactoring
options.d: Localization

questions.text: Which of the following is the development model where a trial model or a pilot unit is developed at an early stage of system development so that users can verify their requirements in a tangible manner?

options.a: Growth model
options.b: Incremental model
options.c: Spiral model
options.d: Prototyping model

questions.text: Among the charts and diagrams created for project management, which of the following is the most appropriate chart or diagram that can be used to visually check the overall status of progress as well as the planned start and finish dates?

options.a: Arrow diagram
options.b: Gantt chart
options.c: Cause and effect diagram
options.d: Pareto chart

questions.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate example of a project?

options.a: Performing the periodic or schedule-based inspection of the ATM in a bank
options.b: Creating a monthly report concerning actual production results in a factory
options.c: Increasing the purchase volume of popular or best-selling products in a shop
options.d: Developing a new large-scale online system in a software house

questions.text: Which of the following is the activity that is performed to confirm that project deliverables achieve the required quality?

options.a: Selecting suppliers for tools necessary for the creation of project deliverables
options.b: Performing the review of project deliverables in advance of delivery
options.c: Performing the progress management based on the plan of project deliverables
options.d: Defining the roles and responsibilities of each member involved in deliverables

questions.text: The programming project of image processing using a newly devised algorithm is outsourced to an external vendor. In order to ensure the strict control of handling information, which of the following is an item that must be included in the contract?

options.a: Maintenance plan after development
options.b: Organizational structure of development
options.c: Performance assurance of the program
options.d: Protection of confidentiality

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate diagram or chart used for the identification of the critical path that takes the longest period of time from the start to the end of a project?

options.a: Arrow diagram
options.b: Control chart
options.c: Tree diagram
options.d: Milestone chart

questions.text: When direct one-to-one communication is performed between three project members A, B, and C, there exist three communication paths between A and B, B and C, and C and A. When communication is performed among seven persons, what is the maximum number of communication paths? Here, there exists a single communication path between any two of the seven members.
Which of the following is the framework that describes a collection of best practices of IT service management?

options.c: ITIL
options.d: PMBOK

questions.text: In IT service management, which of the following is an appropriate explanation concerning SLA and SLM?

options.a: SLA is a proposal for improving services that are presented by the service provider, and SLM is an activity for providing technical means to perform the maintenance management of service levels.
options.b: SLA is an agreement on service levels between the service provider and the users, and SLM is an activity for the maintenance and improvement of the quality of IT services.
options.c: SLA defines the activities for measuring the degree of achievement of service levels and identifying problems, and SLM defines the technical means for resolving problems.
options.d: SLA aims at delivering a higher level of services, and SLM aims at providing a common understanding of service contents, required service levels, and other service factors.

questions.text: In a company’s accounting department, a new financial accounting package is to be used, and a new server with the package installed is delivered from a vendor. Operations management of the new server is performed by the information systems department. Among the items A through D described below about what should be agreed between the accounting department as the user department and the information systems department as the operations department from the point of view of service levels, which of the following is the list that contains all of the appropriate items? A: The operating hours available for the financial accounting package B: The cost sharing between both departments for purchasing the new server C: The items to be tested when the new server is received from the vendor D: The scope and frequency of data backup

options.a: A
options.b: A, B
options.c: A, D
options.d: C, D

questions.text: Which of the following is a process of IT service management that proactively identifies and analyzes the root cause of an incident and also manages problems to closure?

options.a: Incident management
options.b: Change management
options.c: Problem management
options.d: Release management

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning the organizational structure of risk management?

options.a: Authority and functions should be concentrated at the executive officer who is in charge of all risk management tasks covering from detection or identification to evaluation of risks.
options.b: Since risk management includes the handling of classified information and material, departments other than those specific to risk management should not be involved in risk management.
options.c: Since risk handling has a direct relationship with insurance and business resource management, the financial department should play the role of the risk management team.
options.d: Measures against risks should be performed by each department possessing authority and functions, and overall management should be performed by the risk management department directly connected with the top management team.

questions.text: In an IT service agreement between a service provider and users, which of the following is the term that means the ratio of the amount of service time provided to users actually during the period of pre-defined service time?

options.a: Responsiveness
options.b: Availability
options.c: Usability
options.d: Serviceability

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning a system audit?

options.a: The actual user of a developed system evaluates the system in order to determine whether or not the system can be brought into full operation.
options.b: Personal identification is performed as authentication for system use, on the basis of fingerprint, voice print, iris image, or any other unique physical representation.
options.c: From an independent standpoint, it is verified whether or not the measures against risks concerning the information system are developed and operated appropriately.
options.d: A system is evaluated by entering the system from outside the network, and trying to steal, modify, or destroy data and programs without permission.

questions.text: through Q88 concerning strategy.

options.a: A framework which is a comprehensive collection of best practices concerning the management and operation rules of IT services
options.b: The organizational ability to guide the development and implementation of an IT strategy in the appropriate direction to establish a competitive advantage
options.c: A specifications package requesting a detailed proposal from a subcontracting IT vendor from which information systems or IT services are to be procured
options.d: An agreement in which the service level is clearly defined by a service provider in order to assure the quality of the service Answer questions Q58 through Q88 concerning strategy.

questions.text: Which of the following is the organizational form of a company that is shown in the chart below?

options.a: Divisional organization
options.b: Functional organization
options.c: Project organization
options.d: Matrix organization

questions.text: The points representing the relations between production factors (w, x, and y) and quality (z) are plotted in the graphs shown below. Which of the following is an appropriate description concerning these graphs? z z z ･ ･ ･ ･･ ･･ ･ ･ ･ ･･ ･ ･ ･ ･ ･ ･ ･･ ･･･ ･ ･･ ･ ･･ ･ ･ ･･ ･ ･ ･ ･ ･･･ ･ ･ ･･ ･ ･･･ ･ ･ ･･ ･ ･ ･ ･･･ ･･ ･ ･ ･ ･ 0 0 0 w x y

options.a: There is no correlation between w, x, y, and z, so none of w, x, and y can be considered as an item for quality control.
options.b: There is a negative correlation between w and z, so w can be considered as an item for quality control.
options.c: Changes in x make a great impact on z, so x can be considered as an item for quality control.
options.d: z is approximately defined as a quadratic function of y, so y cannot be considered as an item for quality control.

questions.text: In order to prepare for any potential bad debt on accounts receivable from a business partner, which of the following is an action that enables the appropriation of a part of the business partner’s property for accounts receivable more preferentially than the other?

options.a: Adding debt
options.b: Issuing an invoice
options.c: Setting collateral
options.d: Increasing interest

questions.text: When a server with a purchase price of 30,000 dollars is leased for a period of five years at a lease rate of 2%, what is the total leasing expense in dollars? Here, the lease rate is shown as a proportion of the monthly lease fee to the purchase price.

Without any particular arrangements with Company A concerning the rights to the work, Company B makes a request to Company A for the development of a program for a sales management system based on the requirements of Company B. In this case, what happens to the original ownership of the copyright of the program?

options.a: Company A and Company B decide the copyright through discussions.
options.b: Company A shares the copyright with Company B.
options.c: The copyright belongs to Company A.
options.d: The copyright belongs to Company B.

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of corporate governance?

options.a: It quantitatively measures and analyzes the cost effectiveness of environmental conservation measures, and publicizes the cost and effects.
options.b: In addition to essential profit-making activities, a company contributes appropriately for the betterment of society by acting as a member of society.
options.c: It is a mechanism for monitoring whether or not business management is being performed appropriately, and maintaining the soundness of corporate activities.
options.d: It publicizes the business status of a company accurately, promptly, and continuously as a part of public relations with investors and analysts.

questions.text: Which of the following is an explanation of compliance enhancement in corporate management?

options.a: Preventing management staff and employees from being involved in illicit or illegal acts that have a possibility of threatening the survival of the company
options.b: Establishing a framework that enables sound management by keeping the use of power by management staff in check
options.c: Improving the level of satisfaction of the interested parties, such as customers, shareholders, and employees, to ensure continued growth of the company
options.d: Increasing competitiveness by securing management resources that can be a source of differentiation against competitors

questions.text: Which of the following corresponds to a third-party audit that is defined in “ISO 9000:2005 Quality management system—Fundamentals and vocabulary”?

options.a: A parent company audits the quality management system of a subsidiary company.
options.b: A customer audits the quality management system of a trading partner company.
options.c: A company audits its own quality management system for internal purposes.
options.d: A certification body audits the quality management system of a client company.

questions.text: Which of the following is the primary purpose of the ISO 9000 series?

options.a: To provide standards for a quality management system that aims to improve customer satisfaction
options.b: To provide the latest methodologies and tools for effective and efficient quality management
options.c: To provide the successful best practices of software development processes and activities
options.d: To provide quality management activities that should be performed in a development project

questions.text: Which of the following is an explanation of core competence management?

options.a: Acquiring management resources from other companies that have an established business operation, in order to gain an advantage over competitors
options.b: Optimizing the combination of business operations in order to have a greater effect than merely operating each business independently
options.c: Concentrating management resources on a company’s own proprietary expertise and technology in order to establish a competitive advantage
options.d: Reviewing best practices of other companies in order to fundamentally improve and restructure the current business processes

questions.text: Which of the following is the terminology used when product improvement, addition of new varieties, and product disposal are planned according to each stage of introduction, growth, maturity, and decline?

options.a: Experience curve effect
options.b: Business continuity plan
options.c: Product portfolio management
options.d: Product life cycle strategy

questions.text: Which of the following is the most appropriate description concerning the advantageous effects of implementing CRM?

options.a: It becomes easy to maintain accurate records about the customer payment status of account receivables.
options.b: It becomes easy to shorten the lead time required from the point of receipt of order to delivery.
options.c: It becomes easy to share sales approach to customers among all of the sales staff members.
options.d: It becomes easy to deeply understand customer needs and establish long-term positive relationships.

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of MOT?

options.a: It is the business activity of a company gaining control of all or part of another company through merger or acquisition for the purpose of expanding the scale of operation.
options.b: It is the concept of management under which a company doing industrial business invests in scientific methods and materials to promote innovation and to grow business continuously.
options.c: It is the business activity of the management of a company raising funds from financial institutions and buying the stock to acquire the controlling interest of the company.
options.d: It is the material management technique for calculating the quantities of the components and materials necessary to produce a product and reflecting the results on the production plan.

questions.text: Which of the following is the system that is used to record sales information when a product is sold at the store, and also to collect, accumulate, and analyze product sales information for each product?

options.a: ECR
options.b: QR
options.c: EOS
options.d: POS

questions.text: Which of the following is a technology that is defined by some international standards and used for contactless IC cards, such as tickets for public transport?

options.a: IrDA
options.b: RFID
options.c: Bluetooth
options.d: Wi-Fi

questions.text: When online shopping via the Internet is done according to the procedure shown in the figure below, which of the following is the point at which this order comes into effect between the two parties unless otherwise specified?

options.a: Transmission of the order mail
options.b: Order entry processing
options.c: Receipt of the order acceptance mail
options.d: Payment for the product

questions.text: Which of the following is a form of e-commerce corresponding to an online bookstore or an online shopping mall that is constructed for individuals on the Internet?

options.a: B to B
options.b: B to C
options.c: C to B
options.d: C to C

questions.text: Among the characteristics required for an embedded system, which of the following is the most appropriate terminology used when a fixed process must be completed within a given period of time?

options.a: Availability
options.b: Reliability
options.c: Real-time ability
options.d: Serviceability

questions.text: Which of the following is the appropriate explanation of the DFD that is created when a business process is analyzed?

options.a: It shows various types of data items handled in the business operations and the interrelations among them.
options.b: It shows various types of data items handled in the business operations, from sets to elements in a hierarchically detailed fashion.
options.c: It shows the flow of data exchanged among the processes that make up the business operations.
options.d: It shows the contents of the processes that make up the business operations, from overview to detailed view in a hierarchical fashion.

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate purpose of installing groupware?

options.a: To integrate groupware into equipment, such as PCs and peripheral devices, and provide basic hardware control functions
options.b: To enhance the overall work efficiency of an organization by providing an environment for collaborative work
options.c: To enhance the organization’s Internet security by implementing a solution that combines both hardware and software into a single security product
options.d: To shorten the period of system development and improve the efficiency of maintenance by installing a suite of packaged software

questions.text: Among the various types of outsourcing services, which of the following is a service that is provided by an MSP?

options.a: Connectivity of “co-location” servers with the Internet environment
options.b: Business processes such as human resource management, accounting, sales, and logistics
options.c: The operations control of an IT infrastructure, such as a network, server, and storage, over the network
options.d: Standard application services over a network through a billing method such as a flat fee

questions.text: Which of the following is an activity that is performed in the requirements definition process of system development?

options.a: Creating and approving computerization plan
options.b: Performing qualitative and quantitative risk analysis
options.c: Estimating investment effect and computerization costs
options.d: Identifying the needs and demands of system users

questions.text: Which of the following is an appropriate explanation of an ASP?

options.a: A business operator or a form of service that provides communication lines for connecting to the Internet
options.b: A service on the Internet for creating a closed community that is accessible to users who are members of the community
options.c: A business operator or a form of service that provides users with application software on a server via the Internet
options.d: An approach of constructing an information system from the viewpoint of a service, rather than from the viewpoint of a product such as hardware and software

questions.text: On the basis of Figure 1, which of the following is an appropriate result analyzed by Mr. A?

options.a: Item V has the lowest total sales and gross profit.
options.b: Item W has the highest total sales and gross profit.
options.c: Item X has the second highest gross profit rate.
options.d: Item U has the highest gross profit and the maximum gross profit ratio. [Technology]

questions.text: In order to calculate the ratio of the gross profit for each item to the total gross profit (hereinafter, the gross profit ratio), the expression is entered in cell G2 of the worksheet shown below, and then copied to cells G3 through G5. Which of the following is the expression that is entered in cell G2? Here, the cells used to calculate the gross profit ratio are displayed in percentage. A B C D E F G Unit Cost Sales Gross profit 1 Item Total sales Gross profit price price quantity ratio 2 Item U 400 200 4,800 1,920,000 960,000 30.9% 3 Item V 450 250 2,310 1,039,500 462,000 14.9% 4 Item W 500 350 5,350 2,675,000 802,500 25.8% 5 Item X 400 150 3,520 1,408,000 880,000 28.3% 6 Total 15,980 7,042,500 3,104,500 100.0%

options.a: F2/E2
options.b: F2/F6
options.d: F2/SUM(E$2:E$5) [Strategy]

questions.text: Mr. A decides to offer a discount of 50 dollars on the unit price of Item U to increase the sales quantity. In order to offer the unit price of Item U at a discount of 50 dollars next month and yet to earn more than the gross profit of the current month, at least how many additional units of Item U must be sold in the next month?

options.d: 3,450 [Technology]

questions.text: In the [Memorandum of the system installation review meeting], which of the following is the list of items that describe the current problems concerning the transportation expense application?

options.d: (4), (5), and (6) [Strategy]

questions.text: In the [Memorandum of the system installation review meeting], which of the following is the list of items that describe the requirements for the system, which are currently not seen as a problem but as a function that is believed to be convenient in the transportation expense application?

options.d: (7), (8), and (9) [Management]

questions.text: Mr. A wants to set the purpose of system installation as “Improving the efficiency of the application procedure.” When system installation is continued on the basis of this purpose, which of the following is an appropriate activity to be performed on a priority basis?

options.a: Enabling all employees to use the system by holding the system explanatory meeting repeatedly
options.b: Installing the system as cheaply as possible by using a commercially available software package
options.c: Informing applicants about the date of payment of the transportation expenses by using e-mail
options.d: Installing the function that can automatically set the applicable fare based on the departure and destination locations

questions.text: The method shown below is used to convert image data for the purpose of compressing the amount of information. How many bits are required to represent the image data shown in Figure 2? [Method of representing the image data] (1) The image data is represented using a run length encoding scheme. When the run length exceeds 128 (i.e., “10000000” in binary), it is split into multiple run lengths in units of 128. For example, when the run length is 200, it is split into 128 and 72. (2) “1” is subtracted from each value represented in the above (1) so that each value can be represented as a 7-bit binary number. After that, “0 for white” or “1 for black” as a color indicator is appended to the first bit position of each of the 7-bit strings. As a result, each run length is represented as shown below. 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Bit position “Run length – 1” (0 through 127) Color bit: “0” for white, “1” for black

options.d: 24 [Technology]
